Thanks for reporting, we need more info to reproduce this.

Which version of TS are you seeing this in? And what exactly were you doing? Are there a lot of errors in the errorlist, is there a high CPU load when this happens?

please re-open using the button on top.
WorkItem.Description:
I have a small project based on the hottowel template where I added some ts files. I changed the project file to add support to compile on save of ts files. 

It seems that the compile on save feature will stop working seemingly at random times and will work other times.

Comments.Message:
This is definitely true. The compile on save does stop working randomly. The solution at that point is to close and re-open the offending file and it starts working again.

The status bar message is very helpful. Without that compile on save would be unusable.

I wonder if anyone is able to repro the circumstances under which it stops working.
Thanks nabog. Your's were very useful tips
I am also seeing this problem: VS2013, TS 0.9.5.  Restarting VS brings TS compiler back.
